trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_SEQ_00<tab>Your plan is set, but G'raha Tia is not without reservations.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wawlika.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Shenza.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Iyaate.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_KRILE_000_001<tab>To use this train as an explosive is a brazen plan. We'll have but one attempt, so we had best make it count!
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_ERENVILLE_000_005<tab>I hope Namikka is safe...
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_ALISAIE_000_010<tab>Well, we have our plan. Now let's finish this train and blast our way into the dome.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_015<tab>We'll make this plan work─see if we don't!
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_GRAHATIA_000_020<tab>While I have no objections to the plan itself, I have one concern.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_GRAHATIA_000_021<tab>How can we be certain Zoraal Ja will not strike Tuliyollal in retaliation?
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_022<tab>I considered the possibility.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_023<tab>But when my brother told me to come and prove myself, he meant it.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_024<tab>He wants to show that his kingdom is superior to Tuliyollal, and it'll give him no satisfaction to attack when he knows I'm not there.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_025<tab>No, he'll be waiting inside the dome. Waiting for us to challenge him so he can crush us and prove his strength.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_ALISAIE_000_026<tab>Indeed... If anything, we're more likely to put Tuliyollal in danger by not taking the fight to him.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_KRILE_000_027<tab>So we indulge Zoraal Ja. At least, until Tuliyollal has shored up its defenses.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_028<tab>Right. We'll charge in from the front and keep his eyes on us.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_029<tab>During which time Koana will find a way to fortify Tuliyollal.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_GRAHATIA_000_030<tab>If you believe this is the best course, then we shall trust in your judgment.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_GRAHATIA_000_031<tab>I expect there will be no small amount of enemy resistance, but we will do all in our power to assist you.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_032<tab>Thank you.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_033<tab>Well, time is of the essence. Let's go and see what's left to be done for the train.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_035<tab>Everyone's hard at work on the train. I can't wait to see how it turns out.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_GRAHATIA_000_036<tab>Hmmm. Where to begin?
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_KRILE_000_037<tab>Shenza has given me a list of materials. We'll see to it they have everything they need!
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_ALISAIE_000_038<tab>It's a shame Cid and his engineers aren't here to help. If they were here, I expect they'd turn it into a flying train.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_ERENVILLE_000_039<tab>Zoraal Ja's forces remain quiet for now. If there is any movement, I'll alert everyone immediately.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_040<tab>Looks like work is getting underway. We'll finish in no time at all!
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_041<tab>So what can we do to help? No need to hold back!
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_042<tab>As I understand it, the two of you met your fair share of craftsmen during the rite of succession.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_043<tab>Would you happen to know a few who'd be willing to come and help us complete modifications to the train?
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_044<tab>Of course! What sort of craftsmen did you have in mind?
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_045<tab>Let's see now...
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_046<tab>Perhaps my greatest concern is keeping the train safe from enemy attacks.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_047<tab>Even with you all aboard to fend them off, it'd be over in an instant if they managed to get just one good hit on the ceruleum tanks.

TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_048<tab>According to eyewitnesses, the soldiers use lightning-based weapons, so I've a mind to install grounding rods. Would you happen to know a carpenter who could handle that?
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_A1_000_001<tab>We could ask Wuk Evu.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_A1_000_002<tab>We could ask the fellow with a fetish for formalities.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_050<tab>A master carpenter from Ok'hanu, eh? If they'd be willing, we'd be glad to have them.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_051<tab>No objections from me. Just be sure not to forget their traditional greeting...
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_052<tab>Heh, you mean Wuk Evu. While he has his quirks, there's no questioning his carpentry!
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_053<tab>A master carpenter from Ok'hanu, eh? If they'd be willing, we'd be glad to have them.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_054<tab>But we'll need more than just a carpenter if we want this done in a timely fashion.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_055<tab>We've got a lot of equipment that needs moving. <var 1A 02 /var>Heavy<var 1A 01 /var> equipment. I don't suppose you know anyone up to the task?
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_A2_000_001<tab>Perhaps Fonjeantaine can help.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_A2_000_002<tab>Perhaps Zurmurwur can help.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_057<tab>Fonjeantaine? That's...certainly a choice.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_058<tab>But I wouldn't exactly call him strong. For a task like this, I think we should ask someone like, say, Zurmurwur.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_059<tab>You're friends with the Yok Huy? I'll be damned. We'll not want for strength with help like that.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_060<tab>Zurmurwur would be perfect! We'd be hard-pressed to find folks stronger than the Yok Huy, and I'm sure he'd be willing to help.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_061<tab>You're friends with the Yok Huy? I'll be damned. We'll not want for strength with help like that.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_062<tab>Next, I'd like to outfit the train with some powerful weaponry of its own.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_063<tab>Like as not, the soldiers will be riding their flying vessels. We'll need countermeasures to deal with them.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_064<tab>That's true... I for one can't use magic, nor am I handy with a firearm like my brother.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_065<tab>Any ideas for ranged weapons we can use?
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_A3_000_001<tab>Let's borrow guns from Koana for everyone!
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_A3_000_002<tab>Let's install ballistas on the train! Big ones!
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_067<tab>Guns, eh? While they'd be suitable in theory, it takes no ordinary marksman to hit a flying target.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_068<tab>So it'd need to be something that doesn't require that level of skill and precision. But weapons aren't exactly my field of expertise...
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_069<tab>Ballistas, eh? While they'd be powerful, it seems to me it'd take too long to reload between shots.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_070<tab>If there were some sort of ballista that could reload quickly, then that might work. But weapons aren't exactly my field of expertise...
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_GRAHATIA_000_071<tab>Perhaps I can be of assistance.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_GRAHATIA_000_072<tab>The Crystarium employed aetheric cannons for its defenses, and I see no reason why the design cannot be adopted for your train.

TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_GRAHATIA_000_073<tab>While I did not conceive them myself, I know their design. It should be possible to build them here, provided we have the requisite materials and skilled smiths.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_074<tab>Now, that sounds like something Fonjeantaine can help with. What are the materials we need?

TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_GRAHATIA_000_075<tab>The barrel can be fashioned from any metal, so long as it's highly conductive to aether. To power the cannon, we will require fire-aspected crystals of the highest purity.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_076<tab>Fire crystals, eh? Might be as the miners over at the Springs can help with that.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_GRAHATIA_000_077<tab>Then if I could leave the crystals and smiths in everyone's hands, I shall get started drawing up the schematics.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_078<tab>Right then, I'll secure us the smiths.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_100_078<tab>In the meantime, could you deal with the materials? Shenza is in charge of our supplies, so it might be good to talk to him about it first.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_079<tab>Well, I think we're set for a plan! Thanks for the consultation!
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WAWLIKA_000_080<tab>Now let's get this train dressed up, and give her the proper farewell she deserves!
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_GRAHATIA_000_085<tab>Right. Time to put my knowledge gained in the First to use.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_090<tab>Hehe, the plan's coming together!
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_091<tab>To make good speed, I'm going to try and enlist some more help from among our friends back in Yok Tural.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_WUKLAMAT_000_092<tab>I'll leave the materials in your care. I think I saw Shenza over to the southeast.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_SHENZA_000_100<tab>That should be enough lumber for the armor. What else do we need...?
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_SHENZA_000_101<tab>Oh! Sorry, I didn't see you there. What can I do for you?
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_SHENZA_000_102<tab>Aetheric cannons? Interesting. I have an idea where we can get the conductive metal, so I'll take care of it.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_SHENZA_000_103<tab>I'm not sure about the fire crystals, though. Might be best if you spoke directly with a miner. Can I leave that to you?
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_SHENZA_000_104<tab>Great!
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_SHENZA_000_105<tab>You're friends with Iyaate, aren't you? One of the best miners around. If anyone can get you the crystals you're after, it's her.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_SHENZA_000_110<tab>Iyaate is sure to get you all the fire crystals you'd ever want, and then some.
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_IYAATE_000_120<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. What brings you around these parts?
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_IYAATE_000_121<tab>The purest fire crystals, you say?
TEXT_KINGMD113_04924_IYAATE_000_122<tab>I think I heard tell about them before, but what was that about...?
